top_comments.comment:
I know it's kind of wild we have any control over visuals on consoles now but I wish there were more hybrid modes - lock me to 30 outside of combat but go 60 during

A few games have this just for cutscenes but I think a properly curated mode would help a lot of games

comments_since_last_sample.body: This game wil look and run better when the ps5 pros out let's just hope they bring a patch out for this for when that happens.
Just got a platinum on my ps5 and I never thought it will be one of my fav games ever.

Lazy ass shit developers. Period. Plenty of games looked as good if not better ran af 60 FPS locked. No reason this isn’t 1620P checkered boarded to 4K, with the same graphical fidelity with a locked 60.
I'll probably play this at 4K 30 on PS5... that resolution drop-off is way to severe in my opinion
Still don't think an 8 to 9 hr experience is worth full price. In my opinion.
How come these guys didn't do the Ghost Runner benchmark and let a random do it?! They didn't want to upset Xbots
Performance mode looks bad on a 1080p display, it can't possibly be true 1080p as quality mode looks sharp and amazing.
Surprising to see such a downgrade to just double the fps.
I would love to see PC and GeForce Now RTX 3080 tier added to the comparison.  From what I'm seeing GeForce Now RTX 3080 tier is blowing expectations out of the water.
I know new gen consoles can't hit 4k 60fps spike, but i thought it might be better than 1080p at least dynamic 4k at 60, but i believe they'll fix that in an update.
"New Faces, by which we mean directly based on the comic faces used for years, but its not the MCU actors so its new"
How does this game run on previous gen consoles. Especially the Xbox one X version.
